name: mental-ts

scripts.debug:nix: npm run lua && npm run build && cd mental && ./Sonic\ Modules --debug --skip-logo
scripts.debug:win32: npm run lua && npm run build && cd mental && ".\Sonic Modules.exe" --debug --skip-logo
scripts.release:nix: npm run lua && npm run build && cd mental && ./Sonic\ Modules --skip-logo
scripts.release:win32: npm run lua && npm run build && cd mental && ".\Sonic Modules.exe" --skip-logo

author: DeanCode
description: A project for writing your game in TypeScript and run the generated lua code inside the mental engine
